tool_description: Executes health checks on containers including readiness probes, liveness probes, and custom health endpoints to determine container operational status.

container_id.description: Container ID or name to check

health_check_type.description: Type of health check: readiness, liveness, custom_http, custom_tcp, exec

endpoint_url.description: HTTP endpoint URL for custom_http checks

command.description: Command to execute for exec checks

error_messages: Container not found: Container ID does not exist or is not accessible.
Invalid health check type: Use one of [readiness, liveness, custom_http, custom_tcp, exec].
Missing endpoint URL: endpoint_url required for custom_http checks.
Missing port: port required for custom_tcp checks.
Missing command: command required for exec checks.
Invalid timeout: Must be between 1-300 seconds.
Invalid retry attempts: Must be between 1-10 attempts.
Health check failed: All retry attempts exhausted, container is unhealthy.
usage: Specify container_id and health_check_type, provide additional parameters based on check type. Returns health status and diagnostic information.

check_duration_ms.description: Time taken for health check in milliseconds

attempts_made.description: Number of attempts made before success or final failure

last_check_time.description: Timestamp of last health check attempt

error_message.description: Error details if health check failed
